top_note: Comprehensive interior reconstruction project including drywall repair, complete interior painting, carpet replacement, and restoration services across 6 rooms. Project includes high ceiling work requiring specialized equipment, extensive fixture coordination, and comprehensive site protection for occupied residence. All work performed to current building codes and industry standards.

trades.name: Interior Reconstruction
trades.note: Room-by-room reconstruction work including Bedroom (combined main/subroom/bay), Living Room, Kitchen (combined main/bay), Entry/Foyer, Hallway, and Garage. All work performed to current IRC and Virginia building standards.

locations.name: Bedroom
locations.note: 343.53 SF floor area, peaked/8' ceiling height. Combined main bedroom, subroom, and bay area with comprehensive flooring replacement.

items.description: Protective film installation and removal for occupied residence

items.description: Curtain/window drapery hardware (3 EA), recessed light fixture trim (1 EA), cold air return cover (1 EA)

items.description: Two-coat premium paint application on all walls

items.description: Complete removal of existing carpet and padding

items.description: New carpet installation with premium padding and professional stretch-in method (includes 8% waste factor)

trades.name: Project Management & Site Services
trades.note: Comprehensive project coordination, protection services, and cleanup management for occupied residence

locations.name: Project Common Items
locations.note: Project-wide services including coordination, protection, cleanup, and debris management

items.name: Material Delivery Coordination
items.description: Scheduled delivery management to minimize disruption in occupied home

items.name: Daily Construction Cleanup
items.description: Ongoing site maintenance and safety protocols for occupied residence including dust control per OSHA 1910.1000

items.name: Scaffold Rental & Setup
items.description: Professional scaffolding rental and setup for high-ceiling work (18'3") compliant with OSHA 1926.451 standards

items.name: Construction Debris Disposal
items.description: Professional waste management including 10-yard dumpster rental, material segregation, and proper disposal at authorized facilities for 4.5 cubic yards total waste

items.name: Professional Carpet Cleaning
items.description: Professional deep cleaning and deodorizing service for hallway carpet as specified for odor control

items.name: Final Construction Cleaning
items.description: Comprehensive post-construction cleaning including detailed dust removal, surface preparation, and final quality preparation

bottom_note: Overhead & Profit: 17% applied to cover project management, supervision, quality control, and coordination of multiple trades including drywall, painting, flooring, and fixture work. Sales Tax: Virginia rate of 6.0% applied to materials only; labor is tax-exempt for residential construction per Virginia state tax code.
disclaimer: Scope of Work: This estimate covers comprehensive interior reconstruction including drywall repair, interior painting, carpet replacement, and all associated restoration services. All materials will meet "like kind and quality" standards. Warranty: 2-year workmanship warranty on all installation and repair work. Timeline: Project estimated at 12-18 business days depending on material delivery and drying times. Terms: Estimate valid for 30 days. Additional work beyond this scope will require separate pricing. Payment terms available upon contract execution.
